My border collies are my best friends.
i am a foodie.

i make and me by waiting tables.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.

content.text: I'm doing alright. I'm trying to decide if I want to get a dog.
That's exciting! I have two border collies. They're my best friends.
Oh, that sounds really nice. I've always wanted a border collie. I love dogs.
They're the best dogs. They're so smart and loyal.
I know, right? I've heard they're really high energy, though.
They can be, but they're also really good at learning tricks.
I'm not sure if I have the energy for a high energy dog.
You could always get a low energy dog. There are lots of great breeds out there.
Yeah, I'll have to do some research. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about dogs.
